description: This file defines the PermissionsClient class, which provides a wrapper around gRPC stubs for interacting with a Permission Service. It offers methods to enumerate, get, grant, set, revoke, delete permissions, and perform various permission-related RPC calls. The file includes constructors, destructor, and methods for managing permission operations via gRPC, using protobuf-generated classes and gRPC channels.

classes.name: PermissionsClient
classes.description: A client class for interacting with the remote Permission Service via gRPC, providing methods for managing permissions for applications.

methods.name: PermissionsClient
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the client with the service endpoint and optional TLS usage.

methods.name: PermissionsClient
methods.description: Constructor that allows specifying custom channel credentials.

methods.name: ~PermissionsClient
methods.description: Destructor for cleaning up the PermissionsClient object.

methods.name: EnumeratePermissions
methods.description: Enumerates permissions for an app using the remote service, returning a list of permission strings.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves the permissions object for an app.

methods.name: Grant
methods.description: Grants specified permissions and bundles to an app.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets the permissions object for an app, replacing existing data.

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revokes specific permissions and bundles from an app.

methods.name: Authorize
methods.description: Authorizes a session token against given permission filters.

methods.name: GetAllForApp
methods.description: Retrieves all permission entries for a specific app.

methods.name: GetAllAppKeys
methods.description: Retrieves all app keys known to the permission service.

methods.name: GetThorToken
methods.description: Acquires a Thor token for an app with specified parameters.

methods.name: GetRegisteredPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves the collection of registered permissions in the catalog.

methods.name: RegisterPermissions
methods.description: Registers new permissions in the catalog, optionally replacing existing entries.

methods.name: DeleteRegisteredPermission
methods.description: Deletes a specific registered permission from the catalog.

methods.name: Endpoint
methods.description: Returns the endpoint string the client is connected to.
